settings.title: Product Description
settings.content: Discover the perfect blend of quality and innovation with Random Cosmetics. Designed for all skin types, this premium cosmetic line offers a flawless finish, long-lasting wear, and skin-nourishing ingredients. Whether you’re looking for a bold statement or a natural glow, Random Cosmetics provides the perfect touch for any occasion.
settings.icon: <svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M12 4L4 12H20L12 4Z' fill='black'/></svg>

settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.content: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days, and delivery typically takes 3-7 business days, depending on your location. Shipping is free for orders over $50, while standard shipping rates apply to smaller orders. Once your order ships, you’ll receive a tracking number to monitor its progress
settings.icon: <svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/></svg>

settings.title: frequently asked questions
settings.content: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all products. If you’re not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us within 30 days of receiving your order for a full refund. We’ll also cover the cost of return shipping if the product is defective or damaged.
settings.icon: <svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M12 4L4 12H20L12 4Z' fill='black'/></svg>
